list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a general law, rule, principle, or criterion by which something is judged.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the appointment violated the canons of fair play and equal opportunity
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cuộc hẹn vi phạm các Canons chơi công bằng và cơ hội bình đẳng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a collection or list of sacred books accepted as genuine.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the formation of the biblical canon
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: sự hình thành của canon Kinh thánh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in the Roman Catholic Church) the part of the Mass containing the words of consecration.
a piece in which the same melody is begun in different parts successively, so that the imitations overlap.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the very simple rhythmic structure of this double canon
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cấu trúc nhịp điệu rất đơn giản của Canon đôi này

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a member of the clergy who is on the staff of a cathedral, especially one who is a member of the chapter. The position is frequently conferred as an honorary one.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was appointed canon of Christ Church, Oxford
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông được bổ nhiệm làm Canon of Christ Church, Oxford
